Bo Hulsey
Human Resources Executive at Sonata Software
Sonata Software Background:Sonata Software has ambitious plans to double its revenues in the next 3 years through organic and inorganic growth. The organization has a robust strategy and has embarked on transformation to ensure that the strategy is executed wellTo enable the CEO and the Executive Leadership Team (ELT) to achieve this, we are looking to onboard a highly qualified Head of Transformation Initiatives to work closely with our CEO and the ELT. This role will have a significant impact on our effectiveness and efficiency by streamlining strategic initiatives, overseeing program management, and communicating objectives to departments. The ideal candidate will have proven success in a business management role, with a special focus on executive-level advising and interdepartmental collaboration.
Title: Head – Transformation Initiatives Level - TBDLocation – US East Coast (preferably in and around NJ)Role purpose:The person would be a part of the CEOs office and assist the CEO and ELT in the formulation and execution of strategy and related plans. The incumbent would program-manage the execution of strategic initiatives and also lead certain key initiatives. Key Objectives:· Oversee strategic business initiatives, from development through successful execution, under the guidance of the CEO and senior leadership · Assist the CEO in key projects/assignments with internal and external stakeholder including clients and the Board· Assist the CEO and ELT in decision-making, program management, and initiative implementation· Lead initiatives independently in line with growth plans and strategic priorities. Key Responsibilities:· Provide, review and monitor business analytics, performance against key organizational performance indicators and key initiatives and consult with CEO and ELT to suggest initiatives/improvements· Report the analysis/metrics/progress to the CEO and ELT and take appropriate decisions and actions in consultation with them. · Anchor key meetings and interactions of the CEO with ELT and key internal and external stakeholders· Program manage and/or monitor completion of key projects/tasks on behalf of the CEO· Communicate key decisions, actions, progress between the CEO and ELT and other stakeholders· Carry out project co-ordination and regular business administration on behalf of the CEO· Serve as liaison with key executives/employees and CEO regarding project updates, business proposals, and planning Experience, skills and qualificationsMBA in Finance, HR or Marketing Five or more years of experience in a business management or executive role in the IT/ITES or related industryExperience in business analysis, budget management, planning and leading strategic initiativesProven success in a project coordination role with project-reporting and inter-departmental coordination/communication skillsGood understanding of business Excellent written and verbal communication skillsExperience in high-growth and fast-paced organizations in similar rolesExperience of having worked directly with the CEOs and CXOs Sonata is a global technology company specializing in platform-based digital transformation, supporting businesses to become connected, open, intelligent and scalable. Sonata’s Platformation™ methodology brings together industry expertise, platform technology excellence, design innovation and strategic engagement models to deliver sustained value to customers. A trusted partner of world leaders in the retail, manufacturing, distribution, travel, services and software industries, Sonata’s software portfolio includes the Brick & Click Retail Platform©, Modern Distribution Platform©, Rezopia Digital Travel Platform©, Kartopia E-commerce Platform©, Halosys enterprise development automation Platform©, CTRM Commodity Trading and Risk Management Platform© and KODO - AI Powered Customer Experience (CX) Platform. Sonata’s Platformation approach ensures services built on Microsoft Dynamics 365, Microsoft Azure, AWS, Cloud Engineering and Managed Services deliver on the Platformation promise. As world leaders in digital technologies including IoT, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Robotic Process Automation, Chatbots, Block Chain and Cyber Security, Sonata’s people and systems are nurtured to deliver on our commitment to excellence in business technology solutions. Why join Sonata Software?
At Sonata, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you will not be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.Sonata Software is an Equal Opportunity Employer encouraging diversity in the workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, national origin, gender identity, age, religion, disability, marital status, sexual orientation, or any other characteristics protected by law.
